review_title: It was a great place to work
pros: Working for the cahrity gave you a real sense of purpose and enabled you to enrich lives
cons: The head office environment could be considered as very beaurocratic

pros: lovely residents to care for, some nice staff, free uniform to wear whilst at work. dbs paid for until you leave.
cons: Could not work around my child's nursery hours despite telling them in a interview prior to been offered the job. discriminating against health issues, alarms were raised about my health and they did not take it into consideration then got rid of me with no warning. awful company
